Campus Safety
Clubs and Activities
Great for these types of students
Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus
What to do for fun
Food and Dining
Dorm Life
Academic Rigor
Tips for prospective students
In three sentences
Comments
The campus police are located on campus. There are call boxes all over the campus for when you might need help. If you work late they will come and walk you back to the dorms or your car.

Since it is an historic town, The Paranormal Club offers a scary but true look at the past. The Hospitality club takes you places like French Lick and Clabber girl. The Arts clubs are very active as well, music, theatre, art appreciation. The new 4 million dollar art and sculture builking will be done in the fall of 2013.
Students who are outgoing will go farther as the more you participate the more you will learn. The options are there you just need to go do it.
Vincennes is a historic town. They have several historic places to visit and they also have a Farmers market every Saturday. They offer free movies and musicals weekly.
You are only 4 blocks from downtown where there are several shops. The Memorial building and bridge is in the heart of the city. They offer a bus to walmart weekly and Van go is available as well.
The dining hall is very large and offers several different lines of food. They always offer a well balanced meal. It is very clean and the people are really friendly.
The dorms are clean and have RA's for assistance. The RA also has special activities on the weekends for their students.
They don't really ask to much of you while doing your work, the main perk is show up for class. Attendance is very important and does help your grade.
Do your homework and participate in class as it makes your learning easier. Ask for help because it is offered at several levels.

Very nice college, the grounds are well kept, the professors are very good and the food in the diner always changes. They offer a wide variety of classes and offer tutoring. They also offer accommodations for the disabled and older students.

textAfterTable: okay i have had much better Dorm Life Good, The noice levels are up some nights but not to bad. friendly RAs and staff willing to help you. Academic Rigor Great Tips for prospective students Study hard, don't slack off, take your work seriously. If you have trouble on anything ask the instructors the are more than willing to help you out. In three sentences Very clean campus, with friendly helpful staff member. The Class sizes are small which makes it a great learning environment. The school has a lot of security which makes for a safe environment.
